msg: Build and run the new test suite from the make style build.

author: lgo
msg: (global): include stdlib.h for its exit() and atexit() declarations.

author: lgo
msg: Make serfmake build and run the new test suite correctly on Linux.
(global): add dependencies and header files for the new tests.
(cmd_check): build and run the new tests, not only serf_response.
(cmd_clean): cleanup artefacts of the new tests.
(load_deps): handle the special case where test_all needs extra dependencies

author: lgo
msg: Fix compile errors and warnings in the test suite on Linux.
(handler_baton_t): changed type of 'done' from BOOL to int.
(prepare_server): add missing parameter in apr_socket_create call.
